description: Let the guest know their room is ready.
text: greetingMessage guestFirstName, and welcome to hotelName! Room roomNumber is now ready you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.

description: Let guest know their room service is on the way.
text: greetingMessage guestFirstName your room service is on its way to Room roomNumber. Enjoy!

description: Tell the guest about the hotel's airport shuttle.
text: greetingMessage guestFirstName we wanted to let you know about the hotelName airport shuttle. It can pick you up or take you directly to the hotelCity airport, and can be booked by apointment
